author: John Romano
title: smartstakepool.io
description: Stakepools have limited functionality for distro or rewards. It's very hard to teach the average joe in 123 how to delegate to a stake pool.
solution: Create a Dapp that turns a Stakepool into a Smart-Stakepool. Instant SSO sign in, wallet creation, stakepool and charity selection and DONE!
experience: Marketing and Product design and launch expert in application development and adoption,
